attachmentretrievaloption.name: AttachmentRetrievalOption
attachmentretrievaloption.description: Provides options for including attachment metadata only, attachment metadata and content, or excluding attachments.

email.name: Email
email.description: Contains base email methods common to both single and mass email.

emailfileattachment.name: EmailFileAttachment
emailfileattachment.description: EmailFileAttachment is used in SingleEmailMessage to specify attachments passed in as part of the request, as opposed to existing documents in Salesforce.

inboundemailresult.name: InboundEmailResult
inboundemailresult.description: The InboundEmailResult object is used to return the result of the email service. If this object is null, the result is assumed to be successful.

inboundenvelope.name: InboundEnvelope
inboundenvelope.description: The InboundEnvelope object stores the envelope information associated with the inbound email, and has the following fields.

massemailmessage.name: MassEmailMessage
massemailmessage.description: Contains methods for sending mass email.

pushnotification.name: PushNotification
pushnotification.description: PushNotification is used to configure push notifications and send them from an Apex trigger.

pushnotificationpayload.name: PushNotificationPayload
pushnotificationpayload.description: PushNotification is used to configure push notifications and send them from an Apex trigger.

renderemailtemplatebodyresult.name: RenderEmailTemplateBodyResult
renderemailtemplatebodyresult.description: Contains the results for rendering email templates.

renderemailtemplateerror.name: RenderEmailTemplateError
renderemailtemplateerror.description: Represents an error that the RenderEmailTemplateBodyResult object can contain.

sendemailerror.name: SendEmailError
sendemailerror.description: Represents an error that the SendEmailResult object may contain.

sendemailresult.name: SendEmailResult
sendemailresult.description: Contains the result of sending an email message.

singleemailmessage.name: SingleEmailMessage
singleemailmessage.description: Contains methods for sending single email messages.
